text: Moving Day is a young adult book of poetry by Ralph Fletcher, with drawings by Jennifer Emery. It was first published in 2006. Thirty-four short free verse poems that express the feelings of a twelve year old boy moving from Massachusetts to Ohio. Some of the topics include packing, the discovery of long lost treasures, giving things away, and doing things one last time. == Notes == * * * == Other websites == * Ralph Fletcher's website * Jennifer Emery's website Category:2006 books Category:Books by Ralph Fletcher Category:20th-century American poems
title: Moving Day (book)
